2051
2052  /**
2053   * Returns a {@link Function} suitable for use as a {@linkplain
2054   * #withTerminalConstructor(Function, Supplier) terminal
2055   * constructor} built from the supplied arguments.
2056   *
2057   * @param lookup a {@link Lookup}; must not be {@code null}
2058   *
2059   * @param mh a {@link MethodHandle} representing a constructor or
2060   * method that will create an object; must not be {@code null}
2061   *
2062   * @return a {@link Function} suitable for use as a {@linkplain
2063   * #withTerminalConstructor(Function, Supplier) terminal
2064   * constructor} built from the supplied arguments
2065   *
2066   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
2067   *
2068   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if the supplied {@link
2069   * MethodHandle}'s {@link MethodHandle#type()} return value has a
2070   * {@linkplain MethodType#returnType() return type} of {@link Void}
2071   * or {@code void}
2072   *
2073   * @exception InterceptorException if any other error occurs
2074   *
2075   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
2076   *
2077   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
2078   *
2079   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
2080   * threads.
2081   *
2082   * @see #withTerminalConstructor(Function, Supplier)
2083   */
2084  public static final Function<Object[], Object> terminalConstructor(final Lookup lookup, final MethodHandle mh) {
2085    final MethodType methodType = mh.type();
2086    if (void.class.equals(methodType.returnType()) || Void.class.equals(methodType.returnType())) {
2087      throw new IllegalArgumentException("mh.methodType().returnType().equals(void.class) || " +
2088                                         "mh.methodType().returnType().equals(Void.class): " + mh);
2089    }
2090    final int parameterCount = methodType.parameterCount();
2091    Function<Object[], Object> returnValue = null;
2092    if (parameterCount < 0) {
2093      throw new IllegalArgumentException("mh.methodType().parameterCount() <= 0: " + mh);
2094    } else if (parameterCount == 0) {
2095      final MethodType supplierGetSignature = MethodType.methodType(Object.class);
2096      try {
2097        final Supplier<?> supplier =
2098          (Supplier<?>)LambdaMetafactory.metafactory(lookup,
2099                                                     "get",
2100                                                     MethodType.methodType(Supplier.class),
2101                                                     supplierGetSignature,
2102                                                     mh,
2103                                                     methodType)
2104          .getTarget()
2105          .invokeExact();
2106        returnValue = parameters -> supplier.get();
2107      } catch (final RuntimeException | Error e) {
2108        throw e;
2109      } catch (final Exception e) {
2110        if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
2111          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
2112        }
2113        throw new InterceptorException(e.getMessage(), e);
2114      } catch (final Throwable e) {
2115        throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
2116      }
2117    } else if (parameterCount == 1 && Object[].class.equals(methodType.parameterType(0))) {
2118      final MethodType functionApplySignature = MethodType.methodType(Object.class, List.of(Object.class));
2119      try {
2120        returnValue =
2121          (Function<Object[], Object>)LambdaMetafactory.metafactory(lookup,
2122                                                                    "apply",
2123                                                                    MethodType.methodType(Function.class),
2124                                                                    functionApplySignature,
2125                                                                    mh,
2126                                                                    methodType)
2127          .getTarget()
2128          .invokeExact();
2129      } catch (final RuntimeException | Error e) {
2130        throw e;
2131      } catch (final Exception e) {
2132        if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
2133          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
2134        }
2135        throw new InterceptorException(e.getMessage(), e);
2136      } catch (final Throwable e) {
2137        throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
2138      }
2139    } else {
2140      final MethodHandle spreader = mh.asSpreader(Object[].class, parameterCount);
2141      returnValue = parameters -> {
2142        try {
2143          return spreader.invoke(parameters);
2144        } catch (final RuntimeException | Error e) {
2145          throw e;
2146        } catch (final Exception e) {
2147          if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
2148            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
2149          }
2150          throw new InterceptorException(e.getMessage(), e);
2151        } catch (final Throwable e) {
2152          throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
2153        }
2154      };
2155    }
2156    return returnValue;
2157  }
2158
2159
2160  /*
2161   * Inner and nested classes.
2162   */
2163
2164
2165  private static final class NullTerminalFunction implements BiFunction<Object, Object[], Object> {
2166
2167    private static final BiFunction<Object, Object[], Object> INSTANCE = new NullTerminalFunction();
2168
2169    private NullTerminalFunction() {
2170      super();
2171    }
2172
2173    @Override // BiFunction
2174    public final Object apply(final Object target, final Object[] parameters) {
2175      return null;
2176    }
2177
2178  }
2179
2180  private static interface InterceptorProcedure extends InterceptorFunction {
2181
2182    public default Object intercept(final Object interceptor, final InvocationContext invocationContext) {
2183      this.execute(interceptor, invocationContext);
2184      return invocationContext.getTarget();
2185    }
2186
2187    void execute(final Object interceptor, final InvocationContext invocationContext);
2188
2189  }
2190
2191}
